 2022-04442022-04-29,  ECCC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Designating Regulatory Provisions for Purposes of Enforcement (Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999)
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS DESIGNATING REGULATORY PROVISIONS FOR PURPOSES OF ENFORCEMENT (CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999) in order to designate prohibitions on the import, sale, and offer for sale of certain composite wood products as set out in the Formaldehyde Regulations to the Schedule to the Designation Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0089 Publication Date: 2022-05-11
